entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • German translation for "in" (generic parameter tooltips) is wrong #71633
  • German translation for "Track Value Source" can be improved #71632
  • German translation for "Directives from" in inheritance margin can be improved #71631
  • Dropdowns in Code Style options have varying heights in other languages #71630
  • Add a guarding code which prevents putting Compilation into ISG pipeline. #71629
  • Provide a public Nagivation API #71627
  • Update Features test baselines for TFM-dependent tests #71625

Closed

  • Roslyn Compilation, 160 errors and process terminated due to NullReferenceException when a class with primary constructor implements INotifyPropertyChanged #71400
    17.10
  • Refresh ILVerify and file runtime issues as needed #69860
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify how we add .editorconfigs to Solution Items #71626
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71624
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #71634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Target Workspace and Features layer tests to .NET #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #1 from dotnet/master #66751
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include buildhost deps.json #71597
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only use ReadyToRun on Release builds #71622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
